title: How Do I Use My Phone as a Wi-Fi Hotspot and Access the Internet from Another Device Using My Phone's Mobile Data Connection?
answer:
You can use your phone as a portable Wi-Fi hotspot and share your phone's mobile data

connection with another device. Then you can access the Internet from the device.
